mapper.sql: routing_inspection_id, station_id, operate_type, operate_id, operate_name, operate_time, routing_inspection_status, gprs_id, confirm_operate_id, confirm_operate_name,operate_phone,remark,device_type
mapper.insert: insert into routing_inspections (station_id, operate_type, operate_id, operate_name, operate_time, routing_inspection_status, gprs_id,confirm_operate_id, confirm_operate_name,operate_phone,remark) values (#{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{routingInspectionStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gprsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirmOperateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{confirmOperateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

station_id,
operate_type,

mapper.update:
update routing_inspections
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_id = #{operateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_name = #{operateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
routing_inspection_status = #{routingInspectionStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gprs_id = #{gprsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
confirm_operate_id = #{confirmOperateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
confirm_operate_name = #{confirmOperateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_phone = #{operatePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where routing_inspection_id = #{routingInspectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update routing_inspections set station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_id = #{operateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_name = #{operateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, routing_inspection_status = #{routingInspectionStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gprs_id = #{gprsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirm_operate_id = #{confirmOperateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, confirm_operate_name = #{confirmOperateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_phone = #{operatePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where routing_inspection_id = #{routingInspectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select *,type.type_name as deviceTypeStr from( SELECT ri.gprs_id,s.name,s.operator_type,s.address,s.company_name3, ri.station_id,ri.routing_inspection_id,ri.operate_name,ri.operate_time,ri.operate_phone,ri.device_type, ri.operate_type FROM base_station_management.routing_inspections as ri left join base_station_info as s on s.id=ri.station_id where routing_inspection_id=#{routingInspectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) tmp left join routing_inspection_detail rid on tmp.routing_inspection_id=rid.routing_inspections_id left join gprs_device_type as type on tmp.device_type=type.type_code
